name: Bounce (itch) (Libra Bits)
description:
BOUNCE!


This little game was made for LowRezJam 2022.

You control the bouncy ball with KEY LEFT and KEY RIGHT. You must reach the goal in every level to beat the game. 

Each level contains 3 optional stars, if you really want to master this bouncy ball madness, try to collect all stars!

Controls:

ENTER - Confirm in menus

ESCAPE - Open / close pause menu

ARROW KEYS - navigate in menus and the ball

Have fun!
